name: Little Hiawatha
summary: The "fearless warrior" of the poem is a very small child whose pants keep falling down. He tries to shoot a grasshopper with his arrow, but the grasshopper spits in his eye. He tries to shoot a bunny rabbit, but the rabbit is too cute and pathetic. He tracks a bear, and runs after its cub and right into the mother. But the rest of the animals, thankful for him saving the rabbit, come to his rescue.
info:
• 中文名: 小海华沙
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1937
  • 片长: 9min
  • 语言: 英语
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: David Hand
